Title: Directs the cannabis control board not to issue any license for dispensaries of cannabis until the cannabis control board reviews and closes businesses which are selling cannabis without a license
Summary: Directs the cannabis control board not to issue any license, permit or registration for retail dispensaries of cannabis until the cannabis control board reviews and closes businesses which are selling cannabis without a proper license or permit.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a moratorium on issuing any license, permit or registration for retail dispensaries of cannabis until the cannabis control board reviews and closes businesses which are selling cannabis without a proper license or permit
